title: Is there something wrong with Riot servers? High ping
body:
Hello

I usually have between 28-38 ms whole games but now I have 50-680 ms. most of the time its over 100 ms. I have a 100/100 swedish Line and this high ping is not common for me to have.

replies.body:
I checked and wasn't able to find any records of gameserver issues on EUW recently. Usually, sudden high latency (ping) is caused by issues along your network routing if it's not something on your local network. Before we look at your route, I'd like you to follow the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to 100% confirm your local settings are fine.

Let me know if you continue to experience high latency after taking those steps.
yes there is something wrong with their servers. I see it happening consistently and it seems like theyre doing nothing to fix it. ranked is literally a joke until they fix this problem
